page.title: 07LEISURE EVENTS IN BUNGAY
page.content: In April,the Bungay Marathon is held.Started in 1982,and organized by the Bungay Black Dog Running Club,has raised over 20,000 pounds for charity. Traffic is diverted for the May Day Cycle Races held in the town centre.Mr.L.Wigby started the races in 1978 for the enjoyment of the townsfolk.The Soapbox Derby, an enthusiasticilly supported event for the young people,is also held on this day. In September,the Hog Fair is held on Maltings Meadow, Ditchingham. Based on an old country fair,it was restarted in 1974 by the Lions to raise money for charity. In December the Victorian Street Fayre is held in the town centre.Started in 1981 by the Chamber of Trade, stalls and street plays,help raise money for Christmas street lighting.
